Main
====

The 'Driver' file so to say, run this python file to actually start the app.

It is filled with helper functions for actually getting the app onto your screen, so in that sense it is
both the `View` and `Controller` of the 'MVC model'.


.. autofunction:: chess_main.load_images

.. autofunction:: chess_main.draw_board

.. autofunction:: chess_main.draw_pieces

.. autofunction:: chess_main.draw_gamestate
